scripts.e: echo '*** Espruino interactive session (Ctrl-c Ctrl-C to exit):' && cross-var espruino -j mcu/tooling/espruinoJob.json --port $espruinoPort
scripts.e:flash:DiddlySquat: echo '*** Espruino flash DiddlySquat:'                           && cross-var espruino -j mcu/tooling/espruinoJob.json --port $espruinoPort -e "save()" mcu/src/projects/MCU.DiddlySquat.eWiFi.js
scripts.pkgReview: echo '*** Showing outdated installed packages:'                  && npm outdated --long || true
